metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern take on the classic detective, blending mystery and crime drama, similar to 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: A dark comedy crime anthology series with unique characters and compelling storylines, like 'Brassic' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: A satirical superhero series with dark humor and action, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'One-Punch Man'.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: A German sci-fi mystery with complex time travel elements and a gripping narrative, for fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: An anthology series exploring dark and satirical themes related to technology, like 'Love, Death & Robots' but more grounded.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: A suspenseful and thought-provoking sci-fi thriller with a unique premise, aligning with the themes of 'Foundation' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: A critically acclaimed comedy with a quirky family dynamic and running gags, reminiscent of 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: A hilarious comedy with meta-humor and a lovable ensemble cast, appealing to fans of 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: An optimistic and feel-good comedy with a strong ensemble cast, similar in tone to 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: A philosophical comedy with a unique premise and clever writing, sharing elements with 'Rick and Morty' and 'Futurama'.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: A workplace comedy with a diverse cast and quirky characters, similar in style to 'Scrubs' and 'Parks and Recreation'.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: A mockumentary comedy about vampire roommates, with absurd humor akin to 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: An animated superhero series with mature themes and compelling characters, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'One-Punch Man'.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: A visually stunning animated series with a compelling story and well-developed characters, in line with 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Cyberpunk: Edgerunners
metas.description: A stylish and action-packed animated series with mature themes, fitting for fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'One-Punch Man'.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: A mind-bending limited series with dark humor and surreal visuals, appealing to those who enjoy 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Ozark
metas.description: A dark and suspenseful crime drama with complex characters and a compelling plot, like 'The Night Manager' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: A crime drama focusing on the early days of criminal profiling, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: A British police procedural with intricate plots and intense suspense, similar to 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: A British thriller with political intrigue and high-stakes action, resonating with viewers of 'The Night Manager'.

metas.name: Inside No. 9
metas.description: A British anthology series with dark humor and unexpected twists, similar in tone to some 'Love, Death & Robots' episodes.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: A quirky and bizarre sci-fi mystery with a comedic edge, for fans of 'Rick and Morty' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: A darkly comedic series with a time-loop premise and existential themes, like a more grounded 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: An animated series exploring mental health and reality with a unique rotoscoping style, appealing to fans of thoughtful sci-fi and animation.

metas.name: Star Trek: The Next Generation
metas.description: A classic sci-fi series with thought-provoking stories and compelling characters, similar to 'Foundation' and 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Babylon 5
metas.description: A space opera with complex political intrigue and character development, akin to 'Foundation' but with a different tone.

metas.name: Battlestar Galactica (2004)
metas.description: A gritty and realistic sci-fi series about humanity's struggle for survival, appealing to viewers of 'Foundation' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: A hard sci-fi series with political intrigue and space battles, for fans of 'Foundation' and 'Battlestar Galactica'.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: A sci-fi spy thriller with parallel universes and complex moral dilemmas, aligning with the themes of 'The Night Manager' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
metas.description: A superhero action show, great for fans of 'Fallout' and 'One-Punch Man'.

metas.name: Warehouse 13
metas.description: A comedy and action show about retrieving mythical artifacts; fun for those who like 'Doctor Who'.

metas.name: Stargate SG-1
metas.description: An action sci-fi show with a military team traveling to different planets; those who like 'Doctor Who' and 'Fallout' will enjoy this.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: A comedy and sci-fi show with futuristic concepts and humor; this would suit someone who enjoyed 'Futurama'.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: A British comedy about IT workers; if they enjoy 'Scrubs', they'll like this.

metas.name: Spaced
metas.description: A British sitcom with geeky themes; the humor is similar to 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Taskmaster
metas.description: A British game show with comedians performing absurd challenges; great for fans of comedy.

metas.name: Garth Marenghi's Darkplace
metas.description: A horror parody sitcom; for people with a sense of humor like those who enjoy 'Rick and Morty'.

metas.name: Travelers
metas.description: A sci-fi action show where people from the future inhabit people from the present; fans of 'Doctor Who' will find it appealing.

metas.name: Orphan Black
metas.description: A sci-fi action show with cloning conspiracies; for those who enjoy 'Stranger Things'.
